equipment_effects_icon_text.EFF_CONFLICT:
Incites [Conflict] in an
area around the wearer
equipment_effects_icon_text.EFF_BLEED_ENERGIZE:
Grants [MP Regen] when
inflicting [Bleed] on foes
equipment_effects_icon_text.EFF_PWR_DMG:
additional Spell Power
when using [Damaging Spells]
equipment_effects_icon_text.EFF_PWR_HEAL:
additional Spell Power
when using [Healing Spells]

template_mirror_shield_description: A fragile shield that reflects all spell projectiles while defending.
template_armor_cloak_backpack_descriptio: Removing a backpack will drop all items stored in it.
template_torch_description: Burns out over time while held. Provides additional AC and light while defending.
template_shard_description: Fragile light source that burns eternally. Provides additional AC and light while defending.
template_shield_brittle: +100% degrade chance when hit while defending
template_weapon_description: Hold [Attack] to perform a critical strike.
template_whip_description: Long reach melee weapon. Hold [Attack] to perform a critical strike.
template_knuckles_description: Provides ATK when Main-hand is empty.
template_thrown_description: Thrown weapon. Hold [Attack] to increase damage and distance.
template_gem_description: Can be sold for a high price or thrown. Hold [Attack] to increase damage and distance.
template_rock_description: Heavy thrown weapon. Hold [Attack] to increase damage and distance.
template_glass_description: Imitation gemstone best thrown away. Hold [Attack] to increase damage and distance.
template_armor_monocle_description: Marks yourself as an ally of Shopkeepers when visibly worn.
template_mask_bandit_description: Marks yourself as an enemy of Shopkeepers when visibly worn.
template_potion_empty_description:
Equip and [Attack]
to tap liquids into the bottle from a spout.
template_quiver_description: Ranged weapon ammunition. Equip to use while firing a bow or crossbow.
template_readable_book_description: Written by a denizen of Barony.
Use the book to read its contents.
Also makes good fuel for a boiler.
template_scrap_metal_description: Bits of common material that are used with a tinkering kit.
Poor fuel for heating a boiler.
template_scrap_magic_description: Bits of rare magic material that are used with a tinkering kit.
Good fuel for heating a boiler.
template_tool_mirror_description: "The face is the mirror of the mind,
And eyes without speaking confess the secrets of the heart."
template_tool_towel_description: Use to clean yourself and to bandage bleeding wounds.
template_beartrap_degrade_on_use_cursed: %+d%% chance to break from %s when deployed
template_tool_detonated_charge_descripti: Useless remains from a spent trap.
template_tool_bomb_lockpickable: * Toggle trigger behavior by using [Attack] with a lockpick after deploying
template_tool_teleport_bomb_description: Configure as a receiver for another teleport trap by using a lockpick.
template_tool_pickaxe_description: Breaks boulders and walls on hit.
template_tool_lockpick_description: Unlocks chests, doors and enables tinkering with mechanisms.
template_tool_skeletonkey_description: Unlocks and locks chests and doors.
template_tool_tinopener_description: Allows opening of tinned food while in inventory.
template_food_tin_description: Restores a large amount of hunger.
Requires a tin opener to eat.
template_ranged_armor_pierce: %+d%% chance Armor Pierce from PER stat
template_quiver_silver_attributes: +50% ATK on undead and demons from [Smite]
template_quiver_swift_attributes: +50% Reduced reload time between ranged attacks from [Swift Reload]
template_quiver_fire_attributes: * Provides light on floors and walls
template_quiver_knockback_attributes: * Targets immobilized by status effects receive greater [Knockback]
template_quiver_hunting_attributes: +50% ATK on large and small beasts from [Hunting]
template_equipment_effect_waterwalking: * Wearer floats on water and lava from [Waterwalking]
template_equipment_effect_waterbreathing:
* 100% movement speed in water or
 lava
template_equipment_effect_warning:
* Reveals enemy locations
on the map from [Warning]
template_equipment_effect_footstep_warni: * Reveals locations of moving enemies on the map from [Lesser Warning]
template_equipment_effect_teleportation: * Teleports the wearer to random locations
template_equipment_effect_conflict: * Causes monsters to hunt others regardless of allegiance
template_equipment_effect_slowdigestion: * Increases food satiation and delays starvation
template_lockpick_chests_scrap_chance: %+d%% chance for Tinkering scrap on unlocking chests
template_lockpick_skeletonkey_chests_scr: +0% chance for Tinkering scrap on unlocking chests
template_lockpick_text_mechanisms: * Toggles activation of set Tinkering traps in the world
template_lockpick_automaton_disarm: %+d%% chance to disarm Automatons for Tinkering scrap
template_icon_spell_strike:
Charges a powerful melee
strike dealing +400%% ATK
template_desc_spell_removecurse: to select an item to Uncurse.
template_desc_spell_identify: to select an item to Identify.
template_desc_spell_dominate: MP cost increases for each HP
template_desc_spell_charm: Only 1 monster may be Charmed into
template_desc_spell_fear: Feared targets are unable to attack
and focuses attention on the caster.
template_desc_spell_detect_food: show food locations on the map.
template_desc_spell_telepull: are unable to act until hit.
template_desc_spell_demon_illu: Demon's stats are based on caster.
template_desc_spell_salvage: Only affects items on the ground.
template_attr_spell_shadow_tag: * Damage-Types (Ranged, Axe etc) on Nullified targets always deal 100% damage
-50% MP cost for teleportation spells while active
* Casting [Teleportation] moves caster to marked target
* Casting [Teleport Other] moves marked target in front of caster
template_attr_spell_summon: * Summoned ally LVLs are kept between casts, improving equipment every 5 LVLs (Max at LVL 30)
* MP Cost increases with summon rank
* Expert (60) Magic skill + INT stat creates an additional summon
* [Relinquish Soul] destroys summons and returns MP based on current HP
template_attr_spell_self_polymorph: * [Polymorph] effect dissipates on touching or consuming water
template_attr_spell_acid_spray: +25% base chance to degrade armor per hit
template_attr_spell_charm: %+d%% chance from CHR stat + Leadership skill
template_attr_spell_dominate: * Dominating monsters allows exceeding the Leadership skill ally limit
* Weakened monsters reduce MP cost to Dominate (e.g. Monster with 20 current HP costs 41 MP)
template_attr_spell_revert_form: * Only removes 1 effect at a time
template_attr_magicstaff_charm: %+d%% chance from CHR stat + Leadership skill
template_magicstaff_charm_worn_degrade: * %d%% chance to degrade on use from %s status

description: An artifact found deep within the Ruins. Press [Attack] while equipped to use.

description: Applies magical effects when read. Vanishes on use.

description: Press [Cast] while equipped to invoke.
Press [Defend] while held in Off-hand to alternatively Spellbook-Cast.
Use to repair Spellbooks or inscribe magic words onto Blank Scrolls.

Wield and hold [Defend]
to salvage items on the ground for scrap.
Use the Tinker option to Craft, Salvage, or Repair items in your inventory.
Use to begin mixing potions.
Potions improve with Alchemy skill.
